column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Common Bond makes some wonderful pastries and baked goods here in Houston.  The pastries are good
column2: though some of the chocolate ones were too heavy for the summer (my fault
column3: though).  They make a great assortment of goodies for all tastes.  There are even some gluten-free options (macaroons and a strawberry passion pastry). *Disclaimer*
column4: if you are concerned about cross-contamination
column5: I would advise against Common Bond.  My coworker with celiac enjoyed the strawberry passion pastry and did not suffer any ill effects
column6: though.  The drink selection is fine.  Parking is pretty good for that neighborhood.
